TopicTitle: Crafts Wont Collide With the Terrain When in Map Mode.

Articles.Content:
KSP2 Version: 0.1.0.0.20892
KSP2 Version: 0.1.1.0.21572
KSP2 Version: 0.1.2.0.22258
Operating System: Windows 10
CPU+GPU+RAM: i9 9900K+3070ti+32GB
Mods Used: None

Note I used a 0.1.2.0 save for the following:
0.1.0.0 This also happens
0.1.1.0 The Craft collides with the ground (FIXED)
0.1.2.0 The Craft acts like 0.1.0.0 again (REGRESSION)

Steps to Replicate:

  1. Load 0120MapModeCollisionTestSave
  2. Timewarp (or not) to near the ground
  3. Wait for lack of collision

Save File:
https://www.dropbox.com/s/25s0jd0uyel6duo/0120MapModeCollisionTestSave.zip?dl=0

Video Evidence:
0.1.1.0
https://youtu.be/Vzt2cbnL2cY (16 Seconds)
0.1.2.0
https://youtu.be/63eGir1NAA8 (24 Seconds)

Log Files:
https://www.dropbox.com/s/tsrpnqgwlgnucuj/Ksp2%2BPlayer.zip?dl=0

Additional Information:

  • 0.1.1.0 Does collide with the ground in Mapmode but when I zoom out I am looking at Kerbin so maybe this regression was a part of trying to fix that?
  • Tested with Kerbin (atmospheric) as well and the same thing happened.
Edited June 1, 2023 by Anth12
